programme.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Thriller, Sci Fi ║ 2013 ║ 12
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure starring Martin Freeman and Ian McKellen. Bilbo Baggins marches on towards the Lonely Mountain flanked by Thorin and his band of dwarves. programme.title: Arthur's Whisky
programme.desc: When Joan's husband dies, she discovers he'd invented an anti-aging elixir that literally takes the years off. Sharing it with her friends Linda and Susan, the rejuvenated women waste little time in painting the town red, but they soon realise it's a very different world to the one they remember. Co-writer/director Stephen Cookson's comedy, starring Diane Keaton, Hayley Mills, Patricia Hodge, Lulu and David Harewood Stephen Cookson - Director Patricia Hodge - Joan Diane Keaton - Linda Lulu - Susan Hayley Mills - Karen David Harewood - Hal Bill Paterson - Henry Boy George - Boy George Joanna David - Rachel Jaime Winstone - Sharon.

programme.title: The Blackening
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Horror, Romance, Drama, Mystery, Thriller ║ 2022 ║ 15
programme.desc: Seven friends go away for the weekend and end up trapped in a cabin with a killer who has a vendetta. He forces the group to play board game The Blackening, which punishes losing players. programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 3
programme.desc: Following the death of her father Gus, Toula Portokalos honours his dying wish to take the entire family to his childhood village and reconnect with their Greek roots. Toula's husband Ian joins the madcap expedition along with extended family including her brother Nick and Aunt Voula. programme.title: Hypnotic
programme.sub-title: Mystery, Thriller, Drama, Action, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 15
programme.desc: Police detective Danny Rourke is haunted by the abduction of his seven-year-old daughter Minnie from a park. During a bank heist, Danny discovers a photo of his daughter with an instruction to find someone called Dell Rayne. Evidence leads to a psychic Diana Cruz, who introduces the cop to the unseen world of hypnotics - people with the ability to control how we perceive the world. Action thriller, starring Ben Affleck, Alice Braga, William Fichtner and JD Pardo Robert Rodriguez - Director Ben Affleck - Danny Rourke Alice Braga - Diana Cruz J D Pardo - Nicks Hala Finley - Minnie (10 yo) Dayo Okeniyi - River Jeff Fahey - Carl Zane Holtz - Trout Ruben Javier Caballero - Watkins Jackie Earle Haley - Jeremiah William Fichtner - Dellrayne.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.sub-title: Romance, Thriller, Drama, Crime/detective, Action, Music ║ 2017 ║ 15
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, Baby, a young getaway driver with tinnitus, takes part in a heist which seems doomed to fail, especially as the characters involved lose touch with reality as events spiral out of control. programme.title: 8 Mile
programme.desc: Drama starring rap artist Eminem and Kim Basinger. Jimmy "Rabbit" Smith is stuck in a dead-end factory job in a tough area of Detroit where he lives with his highly strung mother and little sister. Jimmy longs to break out of this bleak existence by making it as a rapper, but his road to stardom is going to be a rocky one Curtis Hanson - Director Marshall Mathers - Jimmy \Rabbit\ Smith Kim Basinger - Stephanie Brittany Murphy - Alex Mekhi Phifer - Future Evan Jones - Cheddar Bob Omar Benson Miller - Sol George Eugene Byrd - Wink De'Angelo Wilson - DJ Iz.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Comedy crime drama starring Brad Pitt, Jason Statham and Benicio Del Toro. In Antwerp, jewel thief Franky Four Fingers steals a huge diamond, but before he can deliver it to his New York boss he is ambushed in London by a Russian mobster's henchmen. Elsewhere in the capital, crimelord Brick Top demands that Irish boxer Mickey One Punch take a dive in an unlicensed fight. When Brick Top joins the hunt for the missing gem, mayhem ensues Guy Ritchie - Director Brad Pitt - Mickey One Punch O'Neill Jason Statham - Turkish Benicio Del Toro - Franky Four Fingers Dennis Farina - Avi Vinnie Jones - Bullet Tooth Tony Rade Serbedzija - Boris the Blade Alan Ford - Brick Top Mike Reid - Doug the Head Stephen Graham - Tommy Sorcha Cusack - Mum O'Neil Robbie Gee - Vinny Lennie James - Sol Ewen Bremner - Mullet Jason Flemyng - Darren Andy Beckwith - Errol.

programme.title: The Secret Kingdom

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: Action crime thriller starring Tom Cruise. When five innocent people are gunned down in Pittsburgh, all evidence points to former US Army sniper James Barr. Nevada in the late 1950s: intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones finds himself up to his neck in trouble again when he encounters Irina Spalko and a gang of Soviet agents at a military base in the desert. However, this is only the start of a series of adventures that will take Indy deep into the Amazon jungle in search of a mysterious crystal skull Steven Spielberg - Director Harrison Ford - Indiana Jones Cate Blanchett - Irina Spalko Ray Winstone - George \Mac\ McHale Shia LaBeouf - Mutt Williams John Hurt - Professor \Ox\ Oxley Karen Allen - Marion Ravenwood Jim Broadbent - Dean Charles Stanforth Igor Jijikine - Dovchenko Alan Dale (2) - General Ross Andrew Divoff - Russian soldier.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Harrison Ford and Karen Allen. Indiana Jones's outrageous exploits take him around the world in search of the legendary Ark of the Covenant, a religious artefact of unspeakable power wanted by the Nazis. programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Harrison Ford returns as intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones in the second entry in Steven Spielberg's action adventure series. On the trail of fortune and glory in Shanghai, Indy is launched on a dangerous new quest that takes him to India via the Himalayas. programme.title: Arthur's Whisky
programme.desc: When Joan's husband dies, she discovers he'd invented an anti-aging elixir that literally takes the years off. Sharing it with her friends Linda and Susan, the rejuvenated women waste little time in painting the town red, but they soon realise it's a very different world to the one they remember. Co-writer/director Stephen Cookson's comedy, starring Diane Keaton, Hayley Mills, Patricia Hodge, Lulu and David Harewood Stephen Cookson - Director Patricia Hodge - Joan Diane Keaton - Linda Lulu - Susan Hayley Mills - Karen David Harewood - Hal Bill Paterson - Henry Boy George - Boy George Joanna David - Rachel Jaime Winstone - Sharon.

programme.title: The American Society of Magical Negroes
programme.desc: Satirical fantasy comedy starring Justice Smith and David Alan Grier. Genial artist Aren, who is African-American, is struggling to make sense of his place in the world until he's invited to join a secret society dedicated to enhancing the lives of white people. However, Aren's debut mission tests his loyalty when he and his first assignment fall for the same person Kobi Libii - Director Justice Smith - Aren David Alan Grier - Roger An-Li Bogan - Lizzie Drew Tarver - Jason Munt Aisha Hinds - Gabbard.

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. Revealed as a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as 'Beekeepers', he sets out on a brutal quest of vengeance, hunting those responsible for the incident, who have seriously underestimated how much of a threat he is. programme.title: Black Hawk Down

programme.desc: War drama based on real events, starring Josh Hartnett, Ewan McGregor and Tom Sizemore. On 3 October 1993, elite US troops were sent into Somalia's capital, Mogadishu, to capture two lieutenants working for the local warlord responsible for orchestrating a famine in the region. programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Favourites
programme.desc: Discover some of the very best Sky Originals to watch with the whole family, from Monster Family to The Amazing Maurice.

programme.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
programme.desc: The first part of Peter Jackson's fantasy adventure trilogy based on the book by JRR Tolkien, starring Martin Freeman and Ian McKellen. Encouraged by the wizard Gandalf, Bilbo Baggins leaves the comfort of his home in the Shire to join a band of dwarves in their quest to reclaim the Kingdom of Erebor from the dragon Smaug. It is a journey that will see the plucky hobbit encounter goblins, orcs and a very strange creature called Gollum Peter Jackson - Director Ian McKellen - Gandalf the Grey Martin Freeman - Bilbo Baggins Richard Armitage - Thorin Oakenshield James Nesbitt - Bofur Ken Stott - Balin Sylvester McCoy - Radagast Barry Humphries - Great Goblin Cate Blanchett - Galadriel Ian Holm - Old Bilbo Christopher Lee - Saruman Hugo Weaving - Lord Elrond Elijah Wood - Frodo Andy Serkis - Gollum Aidan Turner - Kili Lee Pace - Thranduil Benedict Cumberbatch - Necromancer Graham McTavish - Dwalin Dean O'Gorman - Fili Stephen Hunter (3) - Bombur Adam Brown - Ori.

programme.sub-title: Drama, Sci Fi, Romance, Comedy ║ 1999 ║ PG
programme.desc: Science-fiction comedy drama starring Robin Williams, Embeth Davidtz and Sam Neill. programme.title: IPL'25: RR v LSG Highlights
programme.desc: Rajasthan Royals face Lucknow Super Giants in the IPL. (19.04).

programme.title: IPL'25 Match-37
programme.desc: Punjab Kings face off against Royal Challengers Bengaluru in the IPL. (20.04).

programme.title: EFL 18/19: Aston Villa v Sheff Utd
programme.desc: In 2019 at Villa Park, Tyrone Mings, Tammy Abraham and Andre Green saved Villa's blushes, scoring three goals in the final 10 minutes to steal a point from the visiting Sheffield United.

programme.title: EFL 18/19:Leeds Utd v Derby County
programme.desc: Frank Lampard's Derby go to Elland Road for the second leg of their 2018-19 Sky Bet Championship play-off semi-final with Marcelo Bielsa's Leeds, with the odds stacked against them.

programme.title: EFL 18/19: Charlton v Doncaster
programme.desc: Two matches of Sky Bet League 1 semi-final play-off action couldn't separate Charlton Athletic and Doncaster Rovers in 2019, as a date at Wembley hinged on a dramatic penalty shootout.

programme.title: EFL 21/22: Coventry City v Fulham
programme.desc: In October 2021, Coventry took Fulham to the sword, putting four past the travelling west Londoners who eventually went on to secure Premier League promotion.

programme.title: PL Greatest:Bradford/Liverpool '00
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, Bradford City take on Liverpool at Valley Parade back in 2000 in one of the Bantams' great Premier League matches.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Leeds/Liverpool 2000
programme.desc: A chance to relive a Premier League classic. Here, Leeds take on Liverpool at Elland Road in a captivating seven-goal thriller back in 2000 that saw Mark Viduka score four times.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Man City v QPR '12
programme.desc: A chance to relive a Premier League classic. Here, arguably the Premier League's most memorable moment, as Man City take on QPR on the final day of the 2011-12 season...Aguerroooooo!

programme.title: PL Greatest:C Palace/L'Pool 2014
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic clash from the Premier League. Here, Crystal Palace host Liverpool at Selhurst Park towards the end of the 2013-14 season in a vital match in the title race.

programme.title: RBC Heritage 2016 Highlights
programme.desc: The RBC Heritage from Harbour Town Golf Links in South Carolina. 2003 US Open champion Jim Furyk seized his second title at this tournament last year in a play-off victory.

programme.title: EFL 21/22: Blackburn v Fulham
programme.desc: In a Sky Bet Championship encounter to remember for the visitors - and one to forget for the hosts - the travelling Fulham put seven unanswered goals past a hapless Blackburn at Ewood Park.

programme.title: EFL 97/98: Charlton v Sunderland
programme.desc: Relive a classic clash from the English Football League - here, rewind to May 1998 for the First Division play-off final at Wembley, as Charlton met Sunderland in an eight-goal thriller.

programme.title: EFL 98/99: Gillingham v Man City
programme.desc: Relive a classic match from the English Football League. Here, remember the thrilling 1998-99 Second Division play-off final between Gillingham and Manchester City at Wembley.

programme.title: EFL 98/99: Bolton v Watford
programme.desc: Relive a classic match from the English Football League. Here, Bolton Wanderers and Watford face off in the First Division play-off final at Wembley back in 1999.

programme.title: IPL'25: MI v CSK Highlights
programme.desc: Mumbai Indians take on Chennai Super Kings in the IPL. (20.04).

programme.title: PSL: Peshawar Z v Multan S Hlts
programme.desc: Peshawar Zalmi compete with Multan Sultans in the Pakistan Super League. (19.04).

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2025 RBC Heritage, a PGA Tour event held at Harbour Town Golf Links in South Carolina. Last season, Scottie Scheffler claimed the win here.

programme.title: Saudi Arabian F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: It's lights out in Jeddah for the 2025 Saudi Arabian Grand Prix. Reigning world champion Max Verstappen crossed the finish line in P1 last season at the Jeddah Corniche Circuit. (20.04).

programme.title: ATP 2025 Season Final Hlts
programme.desc: A men's singles champion is crowned in the final of the BMW Open in Munich, Germany. (20.04).

programme.title: WTA Final: Rouen
programme.desc: A women's singles champion is crowned in the final of the Open Rouen Capfinances Metropole in France. (20.04).

programme.title: ATP 2025 Season Final Hlts
programme.desc: A men's singles champion is crowned in the final of the Barcelona Open in Spain. (20.04).

programme.title: PL Greatest : Man U/Man City 2009
programme.desc: Relive some classic action from the Premier League archive. Here, Man Utd and Man City meet in a memorable derby encounter that produced seven goals and went to the final minute.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Leics/Man U '14
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the Premier League. Here, Leicester City host Manchester United in an eight-goal thriller at the King Power Stadium back in 2014.

programme.title: The Best of England v Australia
programme.desc: Remember some of the most incredible individual performances in Ashes history. Here, a look at Adam Gilchrist's excellent performances with the bat in the 2001 series.

programme.title: ICC Men's T20 WC: AUS v PAK 2010
programme.desc: Over the years, the ICC Men's T20 World Cup has thrown up a host of classic encounters. Here, revisit Australia's 2010 contest with Pakistan.

programme.title: PSL: Karachi K v Peshawar Z Hlts
programme.desc: Karachi Kings take on Peshawar Zalmi in the PSL. (21.04).

programme.title: LIVE: PSL: Multan S v Lahore Q
programme.desc: In the PSL, Multan Sultans battle Lahore Qalandars.

programme.title: ICC Men's T20 WC: AUS v PAK 2010
programme.desc: Over the years, the ICC Men's T20 World Cup has thrown up a host of classic encounters. Here, revisit Australia's 2010 contest with Pakistan.

programme.title: ICC Men's T20 WC: ENG v SL 2014
programme.desc: Over the years, the ICC Men's T20 World Cup has thrown up a host of classic encounters. Here, revisit England's 2014 contest with Sri Lanka.

programme.title: The Best of England v Australia
programme.desc: Remember some of the most incredible individual performances in Ashes history. In this programme, relive Andrew Flintoff's legacy-defining performance in the victorious 2005 series.

programme.title: The Best of England v Australia
programme.desc: Remember some of the most incredible individual performances in Ashes history. Here, a look at Adam Gilchrist's excellent performances with the bat in the 2001 series.

programme.title: The Best of England v Australia
programme.desc: Remember some of the most incredible individual performances in Ashes history. This episode covers Glenn McGrath's dominant 2001 Ashes, which saw him named Player of the Series.

programme.title: PSL: Karachi K v Islamabad U Hlts
programme.desc: Karachi Kings meet Islamabad United in the PSL. (20.04).

programme.title: ATP 2025 Season Final Hlts
programme.desc: A men's singles champion is crowned in the final of the Barcelona Open in Spain. (20.04).

programme.title: Fight Night: Jonas v Price
programme.desc: Natasha Jonas and Lauren Price headline a historic all-women's card at the iconic Royal Albert Hall, as the British pair collide in a world welterweight division unification fight. (07.03).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Teraji v Akui
programme.desc: WBC flyweight champion Kenshiro Teraji and WBA ruler Seigo Yuri Akui meet in a highly anticipated unification clash, with the two-belt showdown topping a world title tripleheader in Tokyo.

programme.title: Fight Night Int:Inoue v Tsutsumi
programme.desc: ...Tsutsumi. An all-Japanese clash at Ariake Arena in Tokyo as Takuma Inoue defends the WBA bantamweight world title against unbeaten contender Seiya Tsutsumi. (13.10).

programme.title: PSL: Quetta G v Lahore Q Hlts
programme.desc: Quetta Gladiators meet Lahore Qalandars in the PSL. Saud Shakeel and the Gladiators put last season's play-off disappointment behind them with an opening-game victory over Peshawar. (13.04).

programme.title: EFL 00/01: Bolton v Preston
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic clash from the Football League. Here, Bolton Wanderers and Preston North End meet in the First Division play-off final at the Millennium Stadium back in 2001.

programme.title: EFL 02/03: Sheff Utd v Wolves
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic English Football League clash. Here, Sheffield United and Wolves meet in the First Division play-off final at the Millennium Stadium in Cardiff back in 2003.

programme.title: EFL 06/07: N. Forest v Yeovil
programme.desc: Relive a classic clash from the English Football League. Here, Nottingham Forest face Yeovil in their Sky Bet League One play-off semi-final second leg at the City Ground in 2007.

programme.title: EFL 08/09: Cardiff v Swansea
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic clash from the English Football League. Here, Cardiff City meet Swansea City in a thrilling south Wales derby at Ninian Park in 2009.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Man Utd/Derby'97
programme.desc: Relive a Premier League classic. Here, Derby County visit Manchester United at Old Trafford back in 1997 on what would be one of the Rams' most memorable Premier League afternoons.

programme.title: PL Greatest: B'mouth/Liverpool '16
programme.desc: A chance to relive a Premier League classic. Here, Bournemouth host Liverpool at the Vitality Stadium in the 2016-17 season in a game that saw the Cherries complete a thrilling comeback.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Arsenal/Spurs 2010
programme.desc: A chance to relive a Premier League classic. Here, Arsenal take on Spurs in a memorable five-goal north London derby at the Emirates in 2010, in a game that saw a stunning comeback.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games: Wolves/WBA '12
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the Premier League. Here, Black Country rivals Wolves and West Brom clash at Molineux back in 2012 in a memorable match for the Baggies.

programme.title: Best of The Women's Openzone
